statements: SELECT * FROM spending_patterns WHERE user_id = 123456;
SELECT category, amount FROM spending_patterns WHERE transaction_date = '2021-10-01';
SELECT user_id, transaction_date FROM spending_patterns WHERE category = 'Groceries';
SELECT credit_card_number, amount FROM spending_patterns WHERE user_id = 7890123 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM spending_patterns WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-09-01' AND '2021-09-30';
SELECT user_id, amount, category FROM spending_patterns WHERE user_id = 1001 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT category, SUM(amount) AS total_spent FROM spending_patterns GROUP BY category ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT user_id, credit_card_number, category, amount, transaction_date FROM spending_patterns WHERE amount > 1000 AND category = 'Travel' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT user_id) AS active_users, COUNT(DISTINCT credit_card_number) AS unique_credit_cards FROM spending_patterns WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_id, category, AVG(amount) AS avg_amount FROM spending_patterns GROUP BY user_id, category HAVING avg_amount > 500 ORDER BY user_id ASC, avg_amount DESC;
SELECT user_id, card_number, credit_limit FROM credit_card_users;
SELECT user_id, spending_amount, card_number FROM credit_card_users;
SELECT credit_limit, user_id, card_number FROM credit_card_users;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, target_group FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_users WHERE credit_limit > 5000 ORDER BY card_number DESC;
SELECT user_id, card_number, spending_amount FROM credit_card_users WHERE credit_limit < 1000 AND spending_amount > 500 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, credit_limit, spending_amount FROM credit_card_users WHERE credit_limit = 2000 OR spending_amount > 10000 ORDER BY credit_limit DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE budget BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY start_date ASC, end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_group FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-05-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM credit_card_users;
SELECT name, age FROM credit_card_users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, address FROM credit_card_users WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spending FROM spending_patterns GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_spending > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM credit_card_users;
SELECT name, age, address FROM credit_card_users WHERE age > 25;
SELECT user_id, MAX(credit_limit) AS highest_credit_limit FROM credit_card_users GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_spending FROM spending_patterns GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT ccu.name, sp.amount, mc.campaign_name FROM credit_card_users ccu JOIN spending_patterns sp ON ccu.user_id = sp.user_id JOIN marketing_campaigns mc ON sp.category = mc.campaign_name;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE full_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM users ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT u.full_name, c.category_name FROM users u INNER JOIN user_categories uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id INNER JOIN categories c ON uc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT full_name, email FROM users WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.transaction_amount, c.category_name FROM transactions t JOIN categories c ON t.transaction_id = c.category_id;
SELECT u.full_name, c.category_name FROM users u JOIN user_categories uc ON u.user_id = uc.user_id JOIN categories c ON uc.category_id = c.category_id;
SELECT u.full_name, t.transaction_amount, t.transaction_date FROM users u JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE u.credit_score > 600;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_users;
SELECT user_name, card_number, credit_limit FROM credit_card_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, card_number FROM credit_card_users WHERE credit_limit > 5000;
SELECT user_id, signup_date FROM credit_card_users ORDER BY signup_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM credit_card_users;
SELECT user_id, user_name, signup_date FROM credit_card_users WHERE credit_limit > 5000 ORDER BY signup_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT cc.user_id, cc.user_name, SUM(ts.amount) AS total_spent FROM credit_card_users cc JOIN transactions ts ON cc.user_id = ts.user_id GROUP BY cc.user_id HAVING total_spent > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;

SELECT tc.campaign_name, COUNT(cs.campaign_id) AS total_campaigns, AVG(cs.total_spent) AS average_spent FROM targeted_campaigns tc LEFT JOIN campaign_statistics cs ON tc.campaign_id = cs.campaign_id GROUP BY tc.campaign_id HAVING total_campaigns > 2 ORDER BY average_spent DESC;

SELECT ts.transaction_date, ts.amount, ts.merchant_name, cc.user_name FROM transactions ts JOIN credit_card_users cc ON ts.user_id = cc.user_id WHERE ts.amount > 1000 AND ts.transaction_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY ts.transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
